plot outline: Muthu's is a hard working young man, who works in a Brick factory. He lives for his sister Meera whose both legs paralysed. He is searching for a man who is willing to marry her. Their uncle Susheelan is addicted to playing cards and he loses all his money playing cards. He exploits Muthu and Meera to get more money from them. Muthu later finds a 'Sidhan' who said he could make her walk. Meera's and Muthu's dreams are coming true, they thought.....
title: Meerayude Dukhavum Muthuvinte Swapnavum
plot: The story of Muthu and his sister Meera.

Muthu's is a hard working young man, who works in a Brick factory. He lives for his sister Meera whose both legs paralysed. He is searching for a man who is willing to marry her. Their uncle Susheelan is addicted to playing cards and he loses all his money playing cards. He exploits Muthu and Meera to get more money from them. Muthu later finds a 'Sidhan' who said he could make her walk. Meera's and Muthu's dreams are coming true, they thought.....::Anonymous
